document.title: Hot Topic: IRS Rules Change Regarding Diesel Fuel Purchases
document.abstract: The Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act (P.L. 103-66), enacted in August 1993, changed the collection point for the excise taxes on diesel fuel to the same as gasoline.

field.name: comments
field.value:
#2
